Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.clustering

Evaluation of clustering results.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCubed
    BCubed measures.
    ClusterContingencyTable
    Class storing the contingency table and related data on two clusterings.
    ClusterContingencyTable.Util
    Utility class.
    EditDistance
    Edit distance measures.
    Entropy
    Entropy based measures.
    EvaluateClustering
    Evaluate a clustering result by comparing it to an existing cluster label.
    EvaluateClustering.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    EvaluateClustering.ScoreResult
    Result object for outlier score judgements.
    LogClusterSizes
    This class will log simple statistics on the clusters detected, such as the cluster sizes and the number of clusters.
    PairCounting
    Pair-counting measures.
    SetMatchingPurity
    Set matching purity measures.

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.clustering Description

Evaluation of clustering results.
